item.title: The Ripple Effects of Granting Status Awards on Coauthors.
item.description:
Reviewed relevant research on collaborative networks of scientists, focusing on the status spillovers: the effect of granting status awards on coauthors.

Matched 7 million data related to the publications and citations of prize winners and their coauthors.

Investigated the impact of prize on the citation rates of both winner and their coauthors’ articles.

Explored the impact of awards prestige, awarded fields, award year, publication year, gender, and age of winners on citation changes for winners and coauthors.
